        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1645</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The fable "The Father and his Sons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Fabel "der Vater und seine Söhne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La fable "le père et ses fils</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O fable "o pai e seus filhos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il fable "il padre ed i suoi figli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο μύθος "ο πατέρας και οι γιοι του</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El fable "el padre y sus hijos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Vocabulary and implementation of grammar rules (capital letters, punctuation etc.) in constructing the story from the jumbled text.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fable</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz und Implementierung der Grammatik 
ordnet an (Großbuchstaben, Interpunktion usw..) wenn die 
Geschichte vom durcheinandergebrachten Text konstruiert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le vocabulaire et la mise en place de la 
grammaire règne (majuscules, ponctuation etc...) en 
construisant l'histoire du texte brouillé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O vocabulário e a execução da gramática 
governam (letras importantas, pontuação etc..) em construir a 
história do texto jumbled.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il vocabolario e l'implementazione della 
grammatica regola (lettere maiuscole, punteggiatura ecc.) nella 
costruzione della storia dal testo jumbled.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λεξιλόγιο και εφαρμογή των κανόνων γραμματικής 
(κεφαλαία γράμματα, στίξη κ.λπ....) στην κατασκευή της 
ιστορίας από το αναστατωμένο κείμενο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El vocabulario y la puesta en práctica de la 
gramática gobierna (las mayúsculas, la puntuación los etc.) 
en construir la historia del texto jumbled.</string>
          </description>
